name: pwny racing
description:
US-CANADA Teams Only: Be ready at 12:00 PM on Nov 7th. Pwny racing will start then (see https://challonge.com/csaw_pwny_racing for when your team is up). We will give teams that are up a 30 minute notice before they have to send in their best pwner for Pwny Racing.

Points:

1st - 500 points

2nd - 400 points

3rd - 300 points

4th - 200 points

5th place - 100 points
flag: the flag will be distributed by adding points on ctfd
